entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
